attributes.title: MOCO'16 Call for Papers
attributes.author: Jules Françoise
attributes.hook: We are pleased to announce MOCO'16, which will be hosted in Thessaloniki, Greece. MOCO'16 will be organized by MINES ParisTech, (France) in co-operation with the Paris 8 University (France), the University of Macedonia, Thessaloniki (Greece) and Aristotle University of Thessaloniki (Greece)...

body: We are pleased to announce MOCO'16, which will be hosted in Thessaloniki, Greece. attributes.title: MOCO'16 Announced
attributes.author: Jules Françoise
attributes.hook: After two amazing years in Paris and Vancouver, it is our pleasure to announce that MOCO'16 will be held in the beautiful Thessaloniki, Greece, early July 2016...

attributes.title: Announcing the MOCO Discussion Group
attributes.author: Jules Françoise
attributes.hook: We just created a discussion group and mailing list for the Movement & Computing community: _movementcomputing@googlegroups.com_. Its purpose is to disseminate announcements related to the field of movement and computing, in particular about the MOCO symposium...
